name: Robots [GMTK GJ 2021]
description:
A simple puzzler where you control multiple robots at the same time.

Controls:
Move - WASD
Rewind - Backspace
Pause - ESC

Credits:
Programming: Vinzenz(Osoka)
Design: Vinzenz(Osoka)
Robot Sprite: Vinzenz(Osoka)
Art: https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown
Font: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold
Sounds&Music: Sadly none :-(

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
